attributes.action: Ensure that ABSOLUTE priority is given to those who participated in the wartime actvity of bomber command, at the unveiling on 28 June 2012
attributes.additional_details: It is appalling that people who weren't there have been given priority in the allocation of tickets for this event.  This is more about grandstanding of politicians and dignitaries on the public stage than it is about honouring those who died and those who survived.  DISGUSTING.
